Script: var i = self.getvar(~rollindex~); var d = self.getvar(~rolls~)[i]; if(!d) { i=0; d = self.getvar(~rolls~)[0]; } if(getstatusself(~robotfreeze~)) { d = 1; } givedice(d); if(self.getvar(~reversecpu~) # (getstatusself(~oddcpureduce~) && d%2==1) ) { adjustrobotcounter(-d); } else { adjustrobotcounter(d); } self.setvar(~rollindex~|i+=1); if(getstatusself(~robotfreeze~)) { self.dicepool[self.dicepool.length-1].animate(~ice~); removestatusself(~robotfreeze~|1); } self.setvar(~updatecounter~|1);
